article.title: The Business of Winning: PDC Poetry on Government Contracts
article.author: Rachel Eisenhower
article.abstract: At a recent AFCEA International PDC course, instructor Judy Bradt took an unconventional twist on teaching and turned the topic of government contracting into poetry.
article.text: At a recent AFCEA International PDC course called "The Business of Winning: Seven Steps in Government Contracting," instructor Judy Bradt took an unconventional twist on teaching. From global and mobile enterprises, to tireless and wireless initiatives, she turned the topic into poetry. Watch the video here.
